reviewText: I love this movie. It is totally on the edge of your seat thriller. There are so many twist and turns, that just when you think you know what's happening. Turns out better.

I could not believe this movie was based on a true story. It just shows me that no matter where you are on this earth, all the money in the world can not buy you a crime free world. This was a story told very well.

This is one of the best  I've seen..it's highly moving and it has all the elements of good cinema...Cant believe this was just a tv movie.

Highly highly recommended.

While the real life event was a tragedy, the movie was well acted.  I liked Poppy Montgomery and the actor who played Ted.  Its a reminder to us common folks that tons of money does not necessarily bring happiness.

The movie got here when expected....I have seen this movie many times and thought I should buy it....If you haven't seen this movie, it is all about a woman "scorned"....and actually its the other way around...how can you compete with "nothing", just goes to show you that it is not always about "another person"...

This movie gives Shawn a chance to show what he can really do besides his roles in daytime soap operas. A good movie that will not disappoint.

Rent this one, it was entertaining.  The acting was pretty good and the storyline didn't drag.  I like the mix with the people telling the story in the after fact mode and then letting it play out.  Well done and it would be a Lifetime winner for a Saturday or Sunday afternoon or weekday the kids are at school flick to watch.

Murder in the Hamptons," the story of a suave successful businessman and his exotic, adoring lover. From the outside, it sounds like a fairytale but behind closed doors, the marriage of Ted Ammon and Generosa Rand was beyond volatile. After the couple's ugly divorce, who would have thought the fallout would lead to murder?

I have watched this movie everytime it is on Lifetime channel.  I love the true crime movies: Betty Broderick, Murder in Greenwich, etc. I would, and have recommended this to many of my girlfriends and co-workers.  I have even bought this as a partial gift for girlfriends birthdays,and as  a just because, etc.
This woman was probably a very unhappy person with money or with out money. The proved that  money cannot make you happy. In fact it might make you a killer.
